short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimal extension to read aloud any Reddit posts, audio books or webpages with the best sounding speech synthesis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Readel reads articles and web pages out loud with clear and great-sounding AI text-to-speech. It's great for listening to online content.

Features:
• Free 10,000 characters per day. Resets daily.
• Voice quality matches Audible.
• Adjust playback speed.
• Access to all voices for free.
• Turn any text into a narrated novel.
• Highlight text you want to read.
• Wide range of browser support
• Built on community feedback.

Supported languages: 29

SUPPORTED BROWSERS: [Chrome, Edge, Brave, Opera]

Find recent updates on our website.
